content: sew through the hole-punched hole on the sign twice hide tail and fasten_off repeat with other arm using the ending tail from arms sew arms at either side of body between rounds 10- 12 hide tail and fasten_off repeat with other arm additional templates life isn t always all life isn t always all life isn t always all bread & butter so this bread & butter so this bread & butter so this pickle will help pickle will help pickle will help you dill with all that you dill with all that you dill with all that life throws your way life throws your way life throws your way designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items reference photo enjoy your new emotional support pickle if you would like to support my designs you can buy me a coffee on venmo @thoseyellowthings designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items
